about_the_game:
In the eerie town of Lgov, an inexplicable phenomenon has gripped its residents—a relentless, perpetual slumber. These people were unmistakably alive, yet impervious to any attempts at awakening. Some even ventured into the streets, becoming nightmarish sleepwalkers, attacking unsuspecting passersby. The cause remains a mystery, but one thing is certain: you must stay vigilant, for the impending doom of a nuclear bomb threatens to obliterate the city. Embark on a harrowing journey through your hometown, scavenge for essential supplies, and confront the twisted denizens of sleep!

As you roam the perilous streets of Lgov, your character will steadily accumulate fatigue, which can be alleviated by consuming coffee, energy drinks, or stimulants. Should fatigue reach its peak or your character succumb to wounds in battle, they will momentarily drift into slumber only to awaken unscathed in their warm bed. However, there is no time for rest! In just 24 hours, the city will be annihilated by the relentless military onslaught!


Sleepless Struggle: Monitor your character's condition and do everything in your power to remain awake. Can you afford a short respite of a few hours to regain strength amidst the chaos?

Strategic Combat: Engage in battles filled with critical tactical decisions. Choose which body part to target, when to defend, or even when to make a hasty retreat from the fray.

Heart-Pounding Horror: Traverse the chilling, nightmarish corners of the city, collecting and utilizing every item you stumble upon to enhance your odds of survival.

Diverse Characters: Play as one of six distinct characters, each with its own unique backstory and abilities, adding depth and replayability to your journey of escape and survival.

short_description: Ultradian is an intense JRPG adventure featuring turn-based combat, Survival Horror elements, and resource management. You must escape the war-torn town of Lgov within 24 hours before a devastating nuclear bomb is unleashed! But beware, falling asleep means certain death!
